title: Software Quality Assurance Course
description: An intensive practical course to prepare you for a successful QA career in just 4 weeks

rows.title: Software Quality Assurance
rows.content: An intensive practical course to prepare you for a successful QA career in just 4 weeks

bricks.content: 4-week intensive online training will help you develop technical and communication skills for a successful career in QA.
Live classes are weekly Sunday to Thursday 9:30â€“11:30 PM Eastern. After each lesson students get handouts and recording.
1:1 support and mentoring. Students can ask questions during the lessons or after them. Even after the course is over.
We will make your resume and post it on job sites with proper keywords so you could get tons of calls from recruiters.
You will learn how to search for a job effectively, answer interview questions and significantly increase chances of getting hired.
Study first, pay us later. No student loans, no debt, and you won't pay a tuition until you land a job making at least $50k a year.

title: Learn DevOps Course
description: An intensive practical course to prepare you for a successful DevOps career in just 12 weeks.

bricks.content: 12-week intensive online training after which you can start looking for a mid-level job.
Live online classes with homework for daily practice. 1:1 support and mentoring, even after the course is over.
You will learn how to answer interview questions and how to pass job interview coding and other tests.
We will make your resume of experienced Engineer, so you can aim at $115K+ salary. We provide internships and references.
The first 2 lessons are FREE. You won't pay full tuition until you land a job. If you don't get a job in IT, you won't owe us anything.
Pay $99 registration fee and 17% of your salary over 24 months (if you don't get a job, the course is FREE) OR $999 fee and 10% of the salary over 18 mo.

rows.title: Learn DevOps
rows.content: An intensive practical course to prepare you for a successful DevOps career in just 12 weeks.
